meanings.definition: relating to the anatomy of the nervous system
meanings.sent1: The neuroanatomic features of the brain help doctors understand its structure.
meanings.sent2: She is studying neuroanatomic details to learn more about the nervous system.
meanings.sent3: The neuroanatomic puzzle was challenging, but she finally solved it.
meanings.sent4: His neuroanatomic knowledge is the foundation of his expertise in neuroscience.
meanings.sent5: The neuroanatomic diagrams in the textbook made the complex topic easier to grasp.

meanings.definition: the study of the structure of the nervous system
meanings.sent1: Neuroanatomic involves examining the intricate details of the nervous system.
meanings.sent2: The neuroanatomic class covers various aspects of the nervous system's structure.
meanings.sent3: During the neuroanatomic lecture, the professor used funny analogies to explain concepts.
meanings.sent4: Her passion for neuroanatomic is like a never-ending journey through the brain's pathways.
meanings.sent5: The neuroanatomic lab sessions allowed students to explore real brain specimens.
